deaths.text: Emperor Huai of Jin (b. 284)
Matilda of Ringelheim (b. 895)
Jingtai Emperor of China (b. 1428)
Thomas Malory, English author and politician (b. 1405)
John Sigismund Zápolya, Prince of Transylvania, the only Unitarian monarch in history, dies.
